summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Sixtieth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fourteenth Avenue Northwest, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 779 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
